product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Helix 3 Tent - Special Buy
long_description: Great for getting away from it all, the 3-season, 3-person ALPS Mountaineering Helix 3 Tent packs down small and light for your backpacking adventures. Freestanding design creates plenty of interior room to move around in; twin doors allow easy entry and exit. Rainfly offers weather protection and plenty of ventilation. Seam-sealed floor is made from heavy-duty polyester taffeta with a durable waterproof polyurethane coating. Mesh panels in the ceiling and mesh windows allow cross-ventilation, preventing condensation inside. Aluminum poles with clip system support the tent; guyout points on rainfly let you stabilize the tent in breezy weather. The ALPS Mountaineering Helix 3 Tent comes with stakes, guylines and a carrying bag. Special buy.
short_description: Great for getting away from it all, the 3-season, 3-person ALPS Mountaineering Helix 3 Tent packs down small and light for your backpacking adventures.
